title: PETA blasts 'shameful' National Dog Show whose best-in-show winner is owned by NFL player

title: Border state lawmaker warns Mayorkas to resign or face GOP-led House probe
description: Rep. Debbie Lesko, a Republican from Arizona, added her voice to those calling for Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro N. Mayorkas to resign or face impeachment.

description: A shooting at a Walmart in North Carolina injured one person, the second act of gun violence at the retail chain this week, following Virginia massacre.

title: Nebraska working on deal with Matt Rhule to make him next head coach: report
description: The Nebraska Cornhuskers are reportedly working on a deal to sign Matt Rhule as their next head football coach. Rhule was fired by the Carolina Panthers in October.

title: Bills’ Von Miller did not tear ACL, expected to be reevaluated in 7-10 days: report
description: An NFL Network report revealed that Buffalo Bills linebacker Von Miller has a lateral meniscus tear, not an ACL tear. Miller will be reevaluated sometime in the next 7-10 days.

description: Tiger Woods and his son will compete at the PNC Championship in December. Last year, Woods and his son, Charlie, finished in second place behind Team Daly.

title: Maryland worker's viral video pokes fun at punch clocks still being used on the job, TikTok users react
description: A viral TikTok video that shows an employee using a punch time clock has been viewed more than two million times, and it has people talking.

title: Minnesota mom allegedly took son’s blood, forced siblings to dispose of it in scheme to fake illness
description: A Minnesota woman allegedly stole her son's blood and abused her other two children, authorities said. She now faces charges of child torture, stalking.

title: Fauci emailed friend saying masks were ‘ineffective,’ pushed for mandates anyway, Missouri AG says

description: The United States came away with a 0-0 draw to the heavily-favored English team in their Group B matchup of the World Cup in Qatar on Friday. U.S. now faces must-win.

description: Chicago police arrested a man who claimed that he had a bomb in his luggage on Friday at O'Hare International Airport, though there was no bomb found.
